pages.text: When something mentions that it $(o)"binds"$() hands, this means that the target's hands have or will be effectively disabled, usually for a very brief period. $(br2)While in this state a bound hand holding an item cannot parry, attack, or be used in general, leaving them open to attacks.
Sources of bind include certain skills, being $(#CCCC00)stunned,$()$(#CCCC00)$(l)knocked down$() or $(#FF0000)$(l)exposed$(), or when wielding a two-handed weapon.
